response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. Given its importance to me, I am offering it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a substantial investment for you, valued at $800,000, and a considerable profit margin for me. I believe this offer strikes a balance between fairness and mutual benefit. I look forward to discussing the details and potentially securing this transaction with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
